channel.title: When players try to log in multiple times-- 1 minute wait
channel.description:
hi, so iam trying to figure out how and what it is that happens when someone trys to log in a client 100 times consecutively. What I want to do is if someone trys to spam log in it will make them wait a minute before it will allow them to log in again.
Is this the Connection-filter and packet throttler on moparclassic??

item.title: When players try to log in multiple times-- 1 minute wait
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

Are you still using EasyRSC?

Read full topic
item.source: When players try to log in multiple times-- 1 minute wait

item.title: When players try to log in multiple times-- 1 minute wait
item.dc:creator: @matty_matt matty matt
item.description:
@matty_matt wrote:

HcoJustin:

Then the issue is not from any throttle filters, it would be from the server not deregistering the player fast enough. It definitely causes no harm, and the minute differences in player count really wont hurt anything, is there a reason you want it to be always accurate?

no, only that i thought this was causing a bug in which when you logged back on you can use prayer, potions, ect and they will be bugged up and not drain.

Any ideas?

Read full topic
item.source: When players try to log in multiple times-- 1 minute wait

HcoJustin:

The console shows 2 players, but if you login do you see a ghost of yourself from earlier just standing there?

no there is no ghost

item.title: When players try to log in multiple times-- 1 minute wait
item.dc:creator: @matty_matt matty matt
item.description:
@matty_matt wrote:

ok because i have a problem where if im logged in and i attack a non aggressive npc then run i click the x in the corner
and have another client open with everything typed in and keep trying to log in until it allows me
there will be 4 second window where my server prompt shows me there is 2 characters on… how else would i fix this if i didn’t do the above mentioned?

Edit- i have been in playerlogin without luck---- any help id appreciate it

Read full topic
